document_data.caption: ''Bustling marketplaces epitomized Ravnican commerce.''
document_data.name: Ravnica
document_data.mainbody: '''Ravnica''' was a [[planet]] whose entire surface was covered by a sprawling city. It was ruled over by ten influential guilds that vied for power amongst each other.
document_data.Geography: The world existed within its own [[plane of existence]]—also called Ravnica—separate from the [[Prime Material plane]] that housed [[Toril]] and its [[crystal sphere]].
document_data.Description:
The ten guilds of Ravnica held power over its people for thousands of years, forming a web of power dynamics, political intrigue, and large-scale conflicts that spanned the planet's entire surface.

Ravnica was a place of immense financial opportunity, that attracted businesses and merchants from across the [[multiverse]].

Inhabitants.Notable Inhabitants:
* [[Sylvene]], a [[planewalker]] who traveled to Toril in the mid–15{{th}} century [[DR]], and found new friends and love in the city of [[Waterdeep]].
* [[Tyreus]], the power-hungry [[wizard]] that sought after the ''[[Stone of Creation]]''.
